page.title: 05Grundisburgh-Energy
page.content: Electricity - Most available and used form of energy for Home and Industry; Supply is sometimes subject to interruption in periods of bad weather. Water - Full provision where required, some Farms licensed to abstract water. Gas - No piped provision. Gas (Bottled and L.P.G.) - Regular delivery and small supplies available retail. Solid Fuel - local delivery and small supplies available retail. Oil - Regular delivery of fuel for Central Heating systems and industrial use. Oil - Supplies of parafin available retail. Motor Fuel and Lubricants - One garage is able to supply a range of necessary products; some farms and local traders carry own private supply.
